sense.def:
To plunder a place
ali
to plunder things from a place
pomeni ukrasti stvari, ki so nekje;

seg.quote: Imperialist governments plunder the weaker nations.
Instead he chose to plunder and kill.

sense.def:
Plunder
je kraja lastnine od nekoga ali z nekega kraja ali to, kar je ukradeno.

seg.quote: ...the savage burning and plunder of the commercial centre of town.
